response.overview: “Concérto” follows the journey of a composer deeply immersed in the creation of his magnum opus. As he feverishly conducts his orchestra of dancers, their rhythmic gestures and precise formations mirror the intricate notes of the music. The line between reality and imagination blurs as the composer delves deeper into the madness of his own creation, ultimately leading to a cathartic crescendo of music and movement.
response.title: Concérto
